missionProperties.campaignName: Hera Syndulla and C1-10P Ally Pack

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

"All right, team. Ready to infiltrate." Hera preps you as you advance on the makeshift prison the Imperials have created for Chopper. "We'll storm it together. When we've got the droid, I'll bring the Phantom around. I'm not leaving him behind; I hope you know what you're doing..." {-} Deploy the heroes and Hera Syndulla to the blue highlighted space. {-} The door is locked.

eventActions.tbText: The door to the makeshift prison is controlled by various terminals.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
One of the terminal controlling the door lock.

{-} A hero can spend 2 movement points to interact with the terminal without using an action ({K}) and try to deactivate it. During that test, that figure may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice.

One of the terminal controlling the door lock.

{-} A hero can spend 2 movement points to interact with the terminal without using an action ({K}) and try to deactivate it. During that test, that figure may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice.

One of the terminal controlling the door lock.

{-} A hero can spend 2 movement points to interact with the terminal without using an action ({J}) and try to deactivate it. During that test, that figure may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice.

One of the terminal controlling the door lock.

{-} A hero can spend 2 movement points to interact with the terminal without using an action ({J}) and try to deactivate it. During that test, that figure may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} A hero can spend 2 movement points to interact with a colored terminal without using an action (Red: {K}; Green: {J}) and try to deactivate it. During that test, that figure may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice.
{-} When all colored terminals have been deactivated, the door unlocks to Rebel figures.
{-} The mission will progress when the door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The door is locked.
{-} A hero can spend 2 movement points to interact with a colored terminal without using an action (Red: {K}; Green: {J}) and try to deactivate it. During that test, that figure may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice.
{-} When all colored terminals have been deactivated, the door unlocks to Rebel figures.
{-} The mission will progress when the door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: With your path cleared, you leap into the Phantom and blast off from the planet. Hera radios to her companions: "Well, it took a little longer than expected, but mission accomplished. Chopper and Spectre-2 returning home." {-} The Rebels win the mission! {-}Heroes receive Hera Syndulla (Spectre-2) and C1-10P ("Chopper") as allies. {-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

The blaster fire from the Imperial reinforcements forces you back and you retreat from the prison facility. You find a place to hide until you can call for another extraction, hoping that Hera and Chopper will be able to survive and escape without your help.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.mainText:
You start to slice into the terminal.

{-} Test {K}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. During the test, you may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText: You don't make any progress. You need to keep trying.

events.eventText:
You quickly deactivate the terminal.

{-} Flip the terminal to the neutral side.

eventActions.mainText:
You start to slice into the terminal.

{-} Test {K}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. During the test, you may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText: You don't make any progress. You need to keep trying.

events.eventText:
You quickly deactivate the terminal.

{-} Flip the terminal to the neutral side.

eventActions.mainText:
You start to slice into the terminal.

{-} Test {J}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. During the test, you may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText: You don't make any progress. You need to keep trying.

events.eventText:
You quickly deactivate the terminal.

{-} Flip the terminal to the neutral side.

eventActions.mainText:
You start to slice into the terminal.

{-} Test {J}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. During the test, you may suffer 1 {C} to reroll up to 2 dice. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText: You don't make any progress. You need to keep trying.

events.eventText:
You quickly deactivate the terminal.

{-} Flip the terminal to the neutral side.

As the last terminal is deactivated, you hear the heavy lock slide off the prison door.

{-} The door is unlocked to Rebel figures.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A sturdy door leads into the makeshift prison.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.
{-} The mission will progress when the door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: The door slides open to reveal a decrepit interior.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A sturdy door leads into the makeshift prison.

{-} The door is locked.
{-} When all colored terminals have been deactivated, the door unlocks to Rebel figures.

eventActions.tbText: A door, controlled by a nearby terminal, appears to lead into a small holding cell. Something is constantly bumping against it from the inside.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The terminal controls the cell door.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I}) to try and open the door to the cell.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I}) to try and open the door to the cell.
{-} The mission will progress when the cell door opens.
Prison guards jump up from their seats and reach for their weapons.

eventActions.theText:
{-} The door is locked.
{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I}) to try and open the door to the cell.
{-} The mission will progress when the cell door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.mainText:
You start to slice into the terminal.

{-} Test {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal.

inputList.theText: You don't make any progress. You need to keep trying.

events.eventText: The door to the cell slides open.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The door shudders as something bumps into it repeatedly.

{-} The door is locked.
{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I}) to try and open the door to the cell.
The terminal controls the cell door. It is inactive.

eventActions.tbText: An agitated, orange astromech bursts out of the makeshift prison cell buzzing and whirring, eager to punish his captors.
{-} When <color="red">C1-10P</color> uses "System Shock", he may target a figure within 2 spaces of any terminal.
More and more enemies rush in, but the onslaught slowly seems to trickle down.

{-} For the rest of the mission, {D} does not increase during the Status Phase.
{-} The Rebels win when all Imperial figures are defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText:
{-} When <color="red">C1-10P</color> uses "System Shock", he may target a figure within 2 spaces of any terminal.
{-} For the rest of the mission, {D} does not increase during the Status Phase.
{-} The Rebels win when all Imperial figures are defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: Hera screams and drops to her knees as she is hit. You hurry to help her, but she waves you off. "No! Go and find Chopper, I'll bring the Phantom around!" She struggles to her feet and stumbles back to the shuttle.
Hera sighs in relief. "There you are, buddy!" Then she turns to you. "Take care of the guards, I'll bring the Phantom around!" She sprints off. {-} C1-10P becomes Focused and gains 2 movement points.
The last wave of enemies rushes in.
